name: Drive GELIK 6x6 Simulato Dubai
description:
Drive GELIK 6x6 Simulator Dubai
Driving Simulator Gelika 6x6 Dubai - If you're a fan of this wonderful car like Helice, then you'll like it!
Even if you're not a fan, you still get a lot of positive emotions!
Ride on the big and beautiful city on a unique 6x6 car!
Such a powerful SUV is not stuck in the sand!
Everyone will be jealous of your choice, feel like a king on the road!
Complete all the levels in the game! Unlock the entire fleet of vehicles! Collect a full car collection at the game!
Ride around the city by car and score points! The faster and longer you will pass, the more you will earn on your next dream car!
Do not drive past the gas canisters, they will help you in the game!
Beat friends highscore!
Feel like a leader in non-road! GELIK - is power!
Leave us your feedback and evaluation, help us to make our app even more interesting!
